pkgmetadata.longdescription: Protracted Birth-Death Model of Diversification // Conducts maximum likelihood analysis and simulation of the protracted birth-death model of diversification. See Etienne, R.S. J. Rosindell 2012 doi:10.1093/sysbio/syr091; Lambert, A., H. Morlon R.S. Etienne 2014, doi:10.1007/s00285-014-0767-x; Etienne, R.S., H. Morlon A. Lambert 2014, doi:10.1111/evo.12433.
